goal.en: Introduce the data characteristics of financial time series and related statistical models. Students will apply the technical methods they have learned to conduct practical data analysis.
goal.ch: 介紹財務時間數列的資料特性及其相關的統計分析模型，學生將運用所學技術進行實務資料分析。

content.en:
1. Financial Time Series and Their Characteristics
2. Linear Time Series Analysis and Its Applications
3. Conditional Heteroscedastic Models
4. Nonlinear Models and Their Applications
5. Multivariate Time Series Analysis and Its Applications
content.ch:
1. Financial Time Series and Their Characteristics
2. Linear Time Series Analysis and Its Applications
3. Conditional Heteroscedastic Models
4. Nonlinear Models and Their Applications
5. Multivariate Time Series Analysis and Its Applications

textbook.en: Tsay, R. S. （2010）. Analysis of Finacial Time Series (3rd edition). John Wiley ＆ Sons, Inc, New Jersey.
textbook.ch: Tsay, R. S. （2010）. Analysis of Finacial Time Series (3rd edition). John Wiley ＆ Sons, Inc, New Jersey.

flex_desc.en: The last two weeks will discuss some recent developments in time series modeling.
flex_desc.ch: The last two weeks will discuss some recent developments in time series modeling.

en.Assessments: Test/Exam ， Assignments ， Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Attendance/Performance
